title: My wife's phone listens all the time. She doesn't have to say, "Hey, Google.". How to shut off?
content: Her Google Fi Pixel 3 seems to be listening to her.  If she says something loudly, asks somebody a question, the Google Assistant will offer her a response such as a suggestion.  She does not have to say, "Hey, Google.". How does she shut this off?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
